name: Organic Synthesis
description: Methods used for forming carbon-carbon bonds will be reviewed, including reactions of the various types of nucleophilic carbon and the use of organometallic reagents. Other topics include functional group interconversions, oxidation and reduction and the role of elements such as boron, silicon and tin in organic synthesis. [36L] CHM345H5 is offered in alternate years, alternating with CHM341H5.
